8090.description: qBittorrent WebUI port. When changing this you must also change environment "WEBUI_PORT" setting.
8090.label: qBittorrent WebUI port

6881.description: Incoming data (DHT). You may need to open it(protocol: udp) on your firewall. Suggested default: 6881. Should NOT be changed
6881.label: qBittorrent DHT port

/config.description: Choose a Share for qBittorrent configuration. Eg: create a Share called qbittorrent-config for this purpose alone.
/config.label: Config Storage

/downloads.description: Choose a Share for qBittorrent downloads. Eg: create a Share called qbittorrent-downloads for this purpose alone.
/downloads.label: Download Storage

PUID.description: Enter a valid UID to run qBittorrent as. It must have full permissions to all Shares mapped in the previous step.
PUID.label: UID to run qBittorrent as.

PGID.description: Enter a valid GID to use along with the above UID. It(or the above UID) must have full permissions to all Shares mapped in the previous step.
PGID.label: GID to run qBittorrent as.
